definition: to get well/to heal/to recuperate/to convalesce/convalescence/to nurse
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: From 2002, Hospitals Include Sanatoriums and Tend and Protect Hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 從2002年起醫院數中包括療養院和護理院。

sentences.english: The luxury naturist holiday spot opened its doors earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 這家豪華的礦泉療養旅館在今年早些時候已經開業。

sentences.english: The Medical & Recuperated Building is a kind of ancient building type.
sentences.chinese: 療養類建築是一種古老的建築類型。

sentences.english: She wrote about the story for the website, “Healing Stories”.
sentences.chinese: 並且將這個故事寫在了“療養故事”網站上。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the advantage of natural convalescent factors of Xingcheng Sanatorium.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查興城療養院區自然療養因子的優勢。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the advantage of natural convalescent factors of Xingcheng Sanatorium.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查興城療養院區自然療養因子的優勢。

sentences.english: Care centers compared to Lacombe, nursing "homes" and other places in Louisiana.
sentences.chinese: 比較拉科姆護理中心，療養院等地方在路易斯安那州。

sentences.english: She spent three years in a sanatorium, returning just as I went to university.
sentences.chinese: 她在療養院住了三年，回來時正趕上我上大學。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method of combination of recuperation and treatment and improve the comprehensive strength of sanitariums .
sentences.chinese: 目的探索療治結合的方法，提高療養院的綜合實力。

sentences.english: The country health agency has dedicated one inspector to monitor conditions in nursing homes.
sentences.chinese: 該國衛生機構已指定一名檢查員監測各療養院的情況。

sentences.english: I think a month at a health resort will do you good.
sentences.chinese: 我看，到療養地去住一個月對你有好處。

sentences.english: Conclusion The study may suggest that health recuperation reduce the psy…
sentences.chinese: 結論健康療養能減輕飛行人員心理負荷。

sentences.english: He's a patient at Oak Valley Nursing Home.
sentences.chinese: 他是橡谷療養院的一個病人。

sentences.english: He went to the Camelon highland yesterday for a change.
sentences.chinese: 他爲着轉地療養昨天到金馬倫去了。

sentences.english: Objective To take advantage of the natural recuperation factors in Beidaihe sanitariums completely.
sentences.chinese: 目的充分發揮北戴河療養勝地自然療養因子優勢。

sentences.english: Objective To take advantage of the natural recuperation factors in Beidaihe sanitariums completely.
sentences.chinese: 目的充分發揮北戴河療養勝地自然療養因子優勢。

definition: to nurse/to look after/to watch over/(old) hospital nurse
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
